parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A BaseAudioContext representing the audio context you want the node to be associated with.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: A ChannelSplitterOptions dictionary object defining the properties you want the ChannelSplitterNode to have (It also inherits the options defined in the AudioNodeOptions dictionary): numberOfOutputs: A number defining the number of inputs the ChannelSplitterNode should have. If not specified, the default value used is 6.
